name: Be Kind Rewind (Sanjuro)
description:
Take the games from the clients, rewind them and bring them to the new customers!
Nobody seems to ever rewind their games after playing them, so you need to do it all by yourself.

Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move 
  • J/Z  near a game VHS to pick up/let a game cart
    • (you can leave them on the ground too)
  • U/V to take out the VHS from the console  (in case you get stuck)
  • ESC to pause
